alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:57PM EDT until July 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Deboullie Mountain to 10 miles west of Fish River Lake to 8 miles east of Clayton Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Eagle Lake, Portage, Deboullie Mountain, Portage Lake, Russel Crossing, Big Machias Lake, Fish River Lake, Madawaska Lake, Nashville Plantation, New Sweden, Perham, Stockholm, Winterville, Westmanland and Round Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
